title: Ametek to acquire Roper Technologies' Gatan for $925 million in cash
text: Ametek Inc. [s; ame], a maker of electronic instruments and electro-mechanical devices, said Friday it has agreed to acquire Gatan, a maker of instrumentation and software for electron microscopes, from Roper Technologies Inc. ROP, -0.28% for $925 million in cash. Gatan has annual sales of about $180 million and is based in Pleasanton, California. The deal is expected to close in the fourth quarter. The company will become part of Ametek's electronic instruments group. Ametek shares were not active premarket, but have gained 33% in 2019, while the S&P 500 SPX, -0.24% has gained 19%.
